response: Our pricing reflects market value and seller expectations. You can always save the item to watch for markdowns.
Items are listed as functional unless otherwise noted. Electronics are sold as-is unless specified.

triggerPhrases: Can I put it on hold?
Will you reserve this for me?
response: To be fair to all buyers, we don't offer holds. Checkout guarantees your item.

triggerPhrases: What if I don't like it?
response: All sales are final, but let us know if something isn't as described and we'll make it right.

triggerPhrases: Can I talk to the seller?
How do I ask about this item?
response: We manage all communication to protect sellers. Ask us anything and we'll get the answer for you.

triggerPhrases: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with Venmo or cash?
response: We accept all major cards securely online. No cash or off-platform payments, please.

triggerPhrases: Is the driver on the way?
response: Track your item in real-time using your ConsignCrew tracking link. We'll update you every step of the way.
ConsignCrew connects sellers with buyers through a trusted, local resale platform. We handle the hard parts.

triggerPhrases: How do I know it's legit?
response: All sellers are verified and items are reviewed by our team. Buy with confidence.
Dimensions are typically listed in the product description. If not, please specify the dimension you are requesting and we'll reach out to verify.

All ConsignCrew listings are fixed-price to protect both buyers and sellers. No haggling necessary! There is a prescribed discount schedule that is time based, but don't wait too long since it's first-come first-serve!
Yes, local delivery is apart of the ConsignCrew service, once you purchase the item we will deliver it to your door in your selected timeslot.

If the listing is live, the item is still available! When someone clicks "Buy It Now", their money is automatically held in escrow until the buyer accepts delivery when the funds are transferred instantly.

We offer delivery in most cases within two business days of buying the item. Once purchased, the ConsignCrew team will pick up the item from the seller, quality control the listing, and then deliver it to you. You will see real-time updates on your profile for all of your purchases.

Each item's condition is put on the listing and then visually reviewed for condition prior to the buyer accepting delivery. Funds are not transferred until the buyer accepts delivery of the item in the expected condition.

triggerPhrases: Where do I go to pick up?
How do I get the item?
response: After checkout, we'll send you a link to schedule a delivery time. Our ConsignCrew team delivers straight to your door.
What you see is what's currently available. We can request more specific photos from the seller if needed.

triggerPhrases: I want to buy it now
response: Click "Buy It Now" on the listing page to complete your purchase. It's fast and secure.

triggerPhrases: Can I list my own item?
response: Yes! Head to consigncrew.com/list-item to get started. We handle everything for you.
